HlsIngest.description: An HTTP Live Streaming (HLS) ingest resource configuration.

properties.name: ingestEndpoints
properties.description: A list of endpoints to which the source stream should be sent.

type.description: A list of endpoints to which the source stream should be sent.

IngestEndpoint.description: An endpoint for ingesting source content for a Channel.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: The system generated unique identifier for the IngestEndpoint

type.description: The system generated unique identifier for the IngestEndpoint

properties.name: Password
properties.description: The system generated password for ingest authentication.

type.description: The system generated password for ingest authentication.

properties.name: Url
properties.description: The ingest URL to which the source stream should be sent.

type.description: The ingest URL to which the source stream should be sent.

properties.name: Username
properties.description: The system generated username for ingest authentication.

type.description: The system generated username for ingest authentication.

properties.name: LogGroupName
properties.description: Sets a custom AWS CloudWatch log group name for access logs. If a log group name isn't specified, the defaults are used: /aws/MediaPackage/EgressAccessLogs for egress access logs and /aws/MediaPackage/IngressAccessLogs for ingress access logs.

type.description: Sets a custom AWS CloudWatch log group name for access logs. If a log group name isn't specified, the defaults are used: /aws/MediaPackage/EgressAccessLogs for egress access logs and /aws/MediaPackage/IngressAccessLogs for ingress access logs.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A short text description of the Channel.

type.description: A short text description of the Channel.

properties.name: EgressAccessLogs
properties.description: The configuration parameters for egress access logging.

type.description: The configuration parameters for egress access logging.

properties.name: HlsIngest
properties.description: An HTTP Live Streaming (HLS) ingest resource configuration.

type.description: An HTTP Live Streaming (HLS) ingest resource configuration.

properties.name: IngressAccessLogs
properties.description: The configuration parameters for egress access logging.

type.description: The configuration parameters for egress access logging.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: A collection of tags associated with a resource

type.description: A collection of tags associated with a resource

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) assigned to the Channel.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) assigned to the Channel.
